comments.content: You're welcome. I think it's cool too. It's nice when other people feature your type in a movie like this :-)

Sure is. I like that one is kinda transported thru the motion, like walking thru it. I guess Jos you will have a lot of work in the future adding more weights to Museo.

Need Business Cards with Museo ?

Cheers

André

Lol. Not yet. Museo is still selling well at the moment and I don't think she wants to gain weight(s). I am thinking of adding italics thou, but I will first finish Museo Sans (+ italics) and Calluna (+ sans).
Let us know about Museo Sans. He he.

A little update: here's a \* [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730175404/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=8gpqoV-6LTI&fmt=18)\* to view it in better quality.  
Made possible with this [simple Youtube hack](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730175404/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=OekRUCChCd4&fmt=18).
